name: form-qc-checker
label: Form QC Checker
description: Gear to check form data as JSON with QC rule set
author: NACC

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter gearbot path prefix

rules_s3_bucket.description: QC rule definitions S3 bucket name

qc_checks_db_path.description: Parameter path for NACC QC checks database credentials

primary_key.description: Primary key field (variable) for the form data project.

strict_mode.description: Validation mode. If false, input data variables that are not in the rule definitions are skipped from validation.

legacy_project_label.description: The label of the Flywheel project where legacy data stored.

date_field.description: Variable name of the visit date field for the module (used to sort the participant visits)

tag.description: The tag to be added on input file upon job completion.
